gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 149, Hawks 144
gameRecap.excerpt: Kawhi Leonard (36 points) and James Harden (30 points, 10 assists) combined for 66 points as the Clippers defeated the Hawks, 149-144. Paul George added 18 points and five assists for the Clippers in the victory, while Trae Young tallied 25 points and 12 assists for the Hawks in the losing effort, his 31st double-double of the season. The Clippers win their fourth straight game as they improve to 34-15 on the season, while the Hawks fall to 22-28.
